    • refl1d.materialdb - Materials Database
    • refl1d.model - Reflectivity Models
    • refl1d.mono - Freeform - Monotonic Spline
    • refl1d.ncnrdata - NCNR Data
    • refl1d.numpyerrors - Decorator for function level error behaviour
    • refl1d.partemp - Parallel tempering optimizer
    • refl1d.polymer - Polymer models
    • refl1d.probe - Instrument probe
    • refl1d.profile - Model profile
    • refl1d.pytwalk - MCMC error analysis using T-Walk steps
    • refl1d.quasinewton - BFGS quasi-newton optimizer
    • refl1d.random_lines - random lines and particle swarm optimizers
    • refl1d.rebin - 1D and 2D rebinning
    • refl1d.reflectivity - Reflectivity
    • refl1d.reflmodule - Low level reflectivity calculations
    • refl1d.resolution - Resolution
    • refl1d.simplex - Nelder-Mead simplex optimizer (amoeba)
    • refl1d.snsdata - SNS Data
    • refl1d.staj - Staj File
    • refl1d.stajconvert - Staj File Converter
    • refl1d.stitch - Overlapping reflectivity curve stitching
    • refl1d.support - Environment support
    • refl1d.util - Miscellaneous functions
    • refl1d.wsolve - Weighted linear and polynomial solver with uncertainty
    • refl1d.mystic.parameter - Parameters
    • refl1d.mystic.bounds - Bounds
    • refl1d.mystic.formatnum - Format numbers
